item.title: Bullet Journal
item.description: How I personally go about journaling the things that happen in my life. Resources CSS: ITS Theme (Also available on the Community Themes) All Alternate Themes CSS Snippet (SlRvb Gray toggled on using Style Settings) Folder Styles CSS Snippet Plugins: Dataview Templater QuickAdd Folder Setup I had a couple areas of my life that I wanted to track which now are the folders you see in the screenshot above.

item.title: Image Positions
item.description: by SlRvb Inspired by Lithou’s Image Flags Syntax âš Note: Markdown syntax will need the note to be reopened to see changes. Wiki Links: ![[Image.png|modifier+modifier|#]] Markdown: ![|modifier+modifier|#](Image.png) Example: ![[Image.png|left+pt|200]] | is required after the image extension and before Obsidian’s sizing numbers + can be anything: ![[Image.png|left-pt-sban|200]] ![[Image.png|left_pt_sban|200]] ![[Image.png|left|pt|sban|200]] ![[Image.png|left pt sban|200]] Simplified Version Optimized for easier comprehension and “quicker” styling

item.title: MediaDB
item.description: MediaDB Vault Setup My media database vault stores nearly all of the Entertainment media that I’m consuming (Excluding 1-off Youtube videos). MediaDB Graph Originally, this used to be a database on Notion for a while before I found Obsidian. Examples of media in the MediaDB Vault are: Literature Fanfics Comics Shows Movies Games Resources CSS: ITS Theme All Alternate Themes Snippet (Tangerine Dunes toggled on in the Style Settings) Kanban Snippet Image Adjustment Snippet Dataview Adjustments CSS (In the Styling Section ) Plugins:
